item.title: Truck Mechanic Simulator 2015
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: ¡Prepárate para los grandes! Este impresionante simulador te pone en la piel del propietario de un taller de coches especializado en camiones. ¡Con más de 100 piezas interactivas por camión, este detallado juego no es para pesos ligeros! 7 modelos de camión altamente detallados 3 categorías de peso Cada camión consta de más de 100 […]

item.title: Fearless Fantasy
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: As Leon, the world’s most dangerous bounty hunter, you embark on a mission to slay the world’s weirdest creatures, and save a girl from an awful marriage. Fearless Fantasy is probably the weirdest RPG you’ll play this year. It’s a turn-based game that deeply involves players during every turn. You use gestures (with the mouse) […]

item.title: Crayon Physics Deluxe
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Crayon Physics Deluxe es un rompecabezas bidimensional que te da la sensación de lo que pasaría si tus dibujos pudieran convertirse mágicamente en objetos reales. Resuelve los rompecabezas, usa tu visión artística y el uso creativo de la física. Características Principales: Física Increíble Más de 70 niveles Fácil de usar Mísiles, Cuerdas, Bisagras

item.title: Coffin Dodgers
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Coffin Dodgers es un juego en el que el objetivo será salvar el alma de uno de los siete jubilados que viven tranquilamente en un hogar del jubilado. Todos ellos han “tuneado” sus scooters para enfrentarse, ni más ni menos, que a la mismísima Parca. Nuestros viejos héroes están armados hasta los dientes con una […]

item.title: Ironclad Tactics
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Ironclad Tactics is a fast-paced, card-based tactics game set in an alternate history Civil War – with steam-powered military robots! Key Features: Includes the ‘Rise of Dmitry’ and ‘Blood and Ironclads’ add-on campaigns! No microtransactions! Unlock cards by playing the game, not by purchasing them separately. Experience unique gameplay, with rapid, simultaneous turns that blend […]

item.title: Gumboy Tournament
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Pon a prueba tus reflejos, juicio y tácticas a la vez que te las ves contra ocho jugadores en esta continuación del popular arcade aclamado por la crítica Gumboy: Crazy Adventures, ganador de numerosos galardones incluyendo JUEGO DEL AÑO 2006 de Gametunnel. Aportando la misma riqueza gráfica y estilo fantástico que hicieron del original Gumboy […]

item.title: Inside The Gear
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: A physics puzzle game like no other! You are inside the big old machine. There are rusty gears and shafts all around you, along with interactive objects such as planks and cubes. Use each object and place the wheel on the platform – easy! Key Features: Unique physics puzzle game. Multiple solutions for each puzzle. […]

item.title: Probably Archery
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Manipulate your wrists, elbows and shoulders to get the arrow to the bow, draw it, aim and fire! Probably Archery gives the player more control over the minutia of their joint movements with tons of crazy scenarios to conquer, multiplayer battles to fight and brutal target challenges to dominate. With controls inspired by games like […]

item.title: Vortex Attack
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Vortex Attack Un juego fácil de jugar, difícil de conquistar. Vortex Attack es un adictivo juego shmup frenético con torneos. Vortex Attack cuenta con gran cantidad de efectos visuales, un innovador sistema de vórtices una enorme variedad de naves mejorables y multijugador hasta 3 jugadores en pantalla este juego le da un giro de tuerca […]

item.title: Ancient Planet
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: Bastion of ancient civilization, a keeper of galaxy wisdom is invaded by alien armies. Use powerful ancient technologies and defeat the attack of enemy armies! What’s special: – 35 unique levels; – Variety of different enemies with unique peculiarities; – New technologies allow choosing appropriate way of defence; – Story line is based on the […]

item.title: Mountain
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: ~ you are mountain – you are god ~ Ambient procedural mountain game, as seen on The Internet. FEATURES – no controls– automatic save– audio on/off switch– time moves forward– things grow and things die– nature expresses itself "Welcome to an existential nightmare."– Patrick Klepek, Giant Bomb "The time I spend with Mountain feels slightly […]

item.title: Last Inua
item.dc:creator: vadmin
item.description: A father and son tale, Last Inua will leave you breathless with its immersive, emotional and captivating gameplay. Last Inua is an immersive and emotional, award winning 2D platform adventure game developed by Glowforth. Designed for the young and old and mixing classic platform genres, culminating in a captivating experience, Last Inua tells the tale […]
